description: 5-email sequence for new Triangle Intelligence subscribers
triggerCondition: User successfully subscribes to any paid plan

subject.version_a: Welcome to Triangle Intelligence, {{firstName}}! Your implementation starts now
subject.version_b: {{companyName}}'s USMCA transformation begins - here's your roadmap

subject.version_a: {{firstName}}, your Mexico supplier introductions are ready
subject.version_b: {{companyName}} matched with 3 Tijuana partners - review & connect

emails.preheader: Pre-vetted supplier matches based on your company profile

content.plainText:
{{firstName}},

Exciting update for {{companyName}}!

Based on your company profile and {{industry}} focus, I've personally matched you with 3 premium Mexico suppliers actively seeking partnerships.

ðŸ­ YOUR CUSTOM SUPPLIER MATCHES:

**MATCH #1: PRECISION MANUFACTURING TIJUANA**
â€¢ Specialization: {{industrySpecialization}}

â€¢ Partnership availability: 2 slots remaining
â€¢ Unique advantage: {{uniqueAdvantage1}}
â€¢ Contact: Maria Rodriguez, Business Development

**MATCH #2: ADVANCED SOLUTIONS MONTERREY**
â€¢ Specialization: High-volume production
â€¢ Capacity: 100,000+ units/month
â€¢ Certifications: ISO 14001, USMCA pre-certified

â€¢ Partnership availability: Immediate
â€¢ Unique advantage: {{uniqueAdvantage2}}
â€¢ Contact: Roberto Martinez, Partnership Manager

**MATCH #3: SUSTAINABLE TECH JUAREZ**
â€¢ Specialization: Eco-friendly manufacturing
â€¢ Capacity: Scalable from prototype to mass production
â€¢ Certifications: {{sustainabilityCerts}}

â€¢ Partnership availability: Selective partnerships only
â€¢ Unique advantage: {{uniqueAdvantage3}}
â€¢ Contact: Carmen Lopez, Strategic Partnerships

ðŸ“ž INTRODUCTION PROCESS:

I can facilitate warm introductions to any/all of these suppliers:

1. **EMAIL INTRODUCTION** (Most common)
   â€¢ I'll introduce you via email
   â€¢ Include your company profile
   â€¢ Highlight mutual benefits

2. **CONFERENCE CALL SETUP** (Recommended)
   â€¢ 30-minute three-way introduction call
   â€¢ I facilitate initial discussion
   â€¢ Answer questions about USMCA compliance
   â€¢ Next steps clearly defined

3. **IN-PERSON MEETING** (Enterprise clients)
   â€¢ I can arrange Tijuana facility visits
   â€¢ Meet multiple suppliers in one trip
   â€¢ Full due diligence support
   â€¢ Partnership negotiations included

ðŸ’¡ MY RECOMMENDATION FOR {{companyName}}:

Start with Precision Manufacturing Tijuana (Match #1)

âš¡ NEXT STEPS:

Reply with:
â€¢ "INTRODUCE ALL THREE" - Full supplier exploration
â€¢ "START WITH MATCH #1" - Focus on Precision Manufacturing
â€¢ "CONFERENCE CALL PREFERRED" - Schedule three-way introduction
â€¢ "NEED MORE INFO" - Additional supplier intelligence first

ðŸš¨ TIMING CONSIDERATION:
These suppliers are limiting new partnerships due to high demand. Moving quickly ensures priority consideration.

Which introduction approach works best for {{companyName}}?

Sarah Chen
Customer Success Manager

P.S. - 94% of clients who connect with our matched suppliers establish successful partnerships. The vetting process saves months of supplier hunting.
